documents.document: @ItsKayditty haha no problem. I got it in the end 🙈 And thank you 😊❤️
@ItsKayditty time zones confuse me bad sometimes. Good morning (?) Kay. I hope you'll have a great day! ☺️❤️
@skummelhummel guess I'll just have to show you in just under 5 months when she has received it and it's done. 🙈👍🏼
Started creating my mums birthday present super early so I'm sure it'll get done. I would love to share but my mum follows me on twitter :b
@RadderssGaming I can understand that though I don't 100% agree. Everyone to their own though ^^
@RadderssGaming you can't really expect there not to be new versions of the songs when they are remaking everything though :p
@iKasperr woke up, scrolled through my twitter feed, saw this, now I really want Starbucks >.>
@Kazzyblood I use the light blue Eos one with mint. I find that it helps my lips the best if they are irritated if I use one with mint ^^
@CallMeChris20xx yup. I've seen ^^
@JesseCox LOL! That Moist sticker is everything!!! 🙌🏼 10/10
@xNikki_B yw 😘 but yeah, I know the struggle of "I've stopped smoking but could really go for a cigarette rn." :b
@xNikki_B fair enough was just reminding you that it was an alternative if necessary ^^
@xNikki_B reason why I started vaping in the first place cause I was super stressed and depressed and didn't wanna start smoking again.
@riversoftarmac @lcfandango true. It depends on how I'm feeling once I'm done with work though since I'm in longer than usual today :3
@riversoftarmac @lcfandango no idea when all of you would be at that time. 😅 I'm still thinking about it if they publish their route though.
@riversoftarmac @lcfandango i'm not out of work till 18:00 and I'm in Corstorphine today so I wouldn't be able to join till 19:00 and I have
@Woddee I mean, burritos are great. :p
One of my old friends just followed me on twitch. I haven't streamed in like a year a half or so 🙈😭
@TheRedQueenRog there has only been one couple in today so far. 😴😴😴 it's so slow!
@Woddee but why!? It so much meat! (Lol) 🙈
@TheRedQueenRog I'm just really bored at work rn D;
@Woddee who would intentionally make that much meat for one person! 🙈
I need buddies to entertain me in snapchat. Be my buddy! 👻: skummelhummel (If your username differs from you twitter handle. Let me know pls
@MandaMilo it's always satisfying to see karma come around to people who really deserve it!
@doctor_wylde why is that person such an massive ignorant dirtbag!? *sigh* been reading their tweets around the thread as well. It's toxic!
@bexyish sweet! I'm excited 😄
@bexyish wooo \o/ just making sure nothing came up or anything 😁
@bexyish yo, I have a day marked off in my calendar. Am I still on for that day? :o
@Julia_CaSsian sorry to hear you aren't feeling well. I hope it gets better soon and let us know if there's anything we can do to help. ❤️
@constantnewb just having it now 👍🏼
@constantnewb oh lol. Now I get it 🙈
@constantnewb or carnage. w/e :p
@constantnewb I more meant that I don't know what carnages mean :p
@zironofsetesh also don't wanna leave the door open for various reasons and there is a lock on the inside. It hasn't really been an issue :3
@zironofsetesh oh lol. I thought you replied to another tweet I made! lol sorry xD
@zironofsetesh exactly handing out keys left and right :p
@zironofsetesh can't leave the door open in this area (or in general) and I'm not permanently employed, only casually, so they aren't
20-20 (kitchen designing program) is the bane of my existence 😩 https://t.co/2107ikqtum
Consuming a small zoo of liquorice animals while waiting for my manager to not be with customers anymore so I can g… https://t.co/MLNfXhNwlP
That feel when you show up at work five minutes before we're supposed to be open but no one is here and the showroom is super dark >.>
I have an awful habit of forgetting to turn the light off in the bathroom so I never really know if someone is in there or not >.>
@MaximusJ07 happy birthday to your brother. Hope you all have a good day! ☺️

This is just like trying to buy something in real life using Monopoly money / does not and should not work.
Always… https://t.co/15Etf0Hs58
@TempForge yeah. I got a bit choked up. Not gonna lie.
I've been quite stressed lately and haven't had a good day today so this makes me really happy. 😭❤️ https://t.co/vjxO797ec3
I miss them a ton and I really wish that I can visit them one day!
But it makes me happy that we can still keep in contact and that we keep up with each other through social media even if we don't talk a lot
Got a lovely message from a family I partly lived with when I lived in Oklahoma, whom I've only talked very little to in the past four years
Today is just not my day. I am so fed up with annoying people and annoying kids and other annoying shit. I'm SO done with today.
I at so excited to get home to a warm flat 😭😭😭
@doctor_wylde I just work in retail so I don't have much choice since parents bring them in all the time and then ignore their screaming! 🙄
@doctor_wylde I can get behind it for sure since I'm not a huge fan cause I have to deal with annoying children more often than I'd like :b
@TheMariaRamie x_x my stomach is screaming for that now! I didn't have lunch today cause I forgot to bring some!
@doctor_wylde @skinnyghost I'm not saying they're not. I'm just amused by it since it's not something you hear very often :p
@doctor_wylde this reminds me of @skinnyghost referring to babies as human larva. I'm ok with this
@JayBrotatoe uhhh... what!? 😂
I. Love. This! https://t.co/7psrnZ3EiY
@constantnewb not win win cause you can permanently live comfortably in a country without knowing the language...
@ghlufxvb I try and distract myself with social media and it's going alright so far:p
@constantnewb that'd require me to learn Spanish though, which I have no desire to :p
@ghlufxvb exactly. But at least it looks like they're leaving now 👍🏼🤞🏼
@ghlufxvb (minus the s in the end >.>
@ghlufxvb they want is some attentions.
@ghlufxvb yup. Quietly is the key word here I think. 😅 Sadly we don't, and it doesn't help when the parents completely ignore them and all
@ghlufxvb very. And that's not to mention their toys that make very loud space gun noises T^T
@ghlufxvb They've been screaming for two hours now and not a word or even a look from their dad 😩😩😩
Update. The screaming kids are still here.... and they're still screaming! And I'm losing my mind! https://t.co/BSOnS4IiN8
@constantnewb I'm not about that life yo T^T
@sCop3SCouT you is a nice change where as I'm used to being cold all the time so being warm is a nice change for me 😅
@sCop3SCouT yeah I don't :p but each to their own :p I also think it may be because you're used to being warmer than I am so being cold for/
Also these toys these kids are playing with are constantly making loud noises and they are making loud noises them selves. 😭😭😭 Save me pls!!
@sCop3SCouT but it's not comfortable to be wearing super many layers. I don't like that I can't wear what I want but I HAVE to wear X layers
@skummelhummel it's the same with people/kids who constantly have to make noises. It's fine when it's not literally ALL THE TIME 🙄🙄🙄🙄
@sCop3SCouT I dunno. When it's cold to the point where I'm still getting chills indoors with three layers, it's too cold for me!
Tbh I'm just in general irritated by random and unnecessary noises like that so when it goes on forever I just wanna leave BUT I can't.
If you're gonna take your kids into shops, please don't give them toys that make loud noises cause it's VERY annoying to ppl who work there!
@sCop3SCouT yeah. I'm more often in cold than warm so I prefer warm. 🙈
@sCop3SCouT same. I just want to not be cold anymore 😭😭😭
@sCop3SCouT yuuup! New heaters should arrive today though, which I'm crossing everything for!!!
@sCop3SCouT our heater broke the day before yesterday so all of yesterday our flat was cold and shit! 😭😭
It is so cold everywhere what the fuck! 😭😭😭😭😭😭

@discordapp yus. Super sad face! Haven't been able to afford to attend a PAX yet, but one day hopefully. T^T
